Package model

Class ModelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ModelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, ClientUserModel, Model, ModelEmployee, ModelUser, utility.observer.javaobserver.UnnamedPropertyChangeSubject
    public class ModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Class implementing Model interface, connecting all classes in the Model package, executing all important actions related to the system, usually by delegating them to Client class that will call them on server side

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ModelManager()
      O argument constructor, creating new order, creating class related to RMI connection and adding itself as a listener to this class, establishing itself as a subject in observer pattern

        productName - name of product of which type is item
        productID - number of product of which type is item
        price - price of an item (without discount)

        quantity - quantity of an item
        categories - list of categories to which item belongs
